mapper.select:
select
from ujcms_collection_field t where t.collection_id_ = #{collectionId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by t.order_, t.id_
mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_collection_field where collection_id_ in (select t.id_ from ujcms_collection t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update ujcms_collection_field set collection_id_ = #{collectionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_ = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_ = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, data_type_ = #{dataType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, source_ = #{source,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, static_value_ = #{staticValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_format_ = #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_pattern_ = #{areaPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_reg_ = #{areaReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_pattern_ = #{itemPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_filter_ = #{itemFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_reg_ = #{itemReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_js_ = #{itemJs,jdbcType=CHAR}, data_url_ = #{dataUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_filter_ = #{dataFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_js_ = #{dataJs,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_ = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_collection_field (id_, collection_id_, name_, code_, type_, data_type_, source_, static_value_, date_format_, area_pattern_, area_reg_, item_pattern_, item_filter_, item_reg_, item_js_, data_url_, data_filter_, data_js_, order_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{collectionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{source,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{staticValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemJs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dataUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataJs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.collection_id_, t.name_, t.code_, t.type_, t.data_type_, t.source_, t.static_value_, t.date_format_, t.area_pattern_, t.area_reg_, t.item_pattern_, t.item_filter_, t.item_reg_, t.item_js_, t.data_url_, t.data_filter_, t.data_js_, t.order_
